text:
Hello everyone, this is my first time posting here and I'm not totally sure if this is the right place to post this, am posting for a coworker:

We recently launched a client website from staging and when all the pages went live all of the buttons broke. It seems like there is a bug in staging and it's not connecting the old page ID for the staged page to the new "launched" pages. We also tested it out in our portal and the same issue is happening that we have not run into before.
